events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's value changes. You can pull out the new value by accessing `event.target.value` (string).

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's value changes.

events.name: onClear
events.description: Handler that is called when the clear button is clicked.

label.description: The content to display as the label.

value.description: The current value of the input (controlled).

defaultValue.description: The default value of the input (uncontrolled).

description.description: A description for the input. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.

errorMessage.description: An error message for the input.

startContent.description: Element to be rendered in the left side of the input.

endContent.description: Element to be rendered in the right side of the input.

fullWidth.description: Whether the input should take up the width of its parent.

isClearable.description: Whether the input should have a clear button.

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.

isReadOnly.description: Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.

validationState.description: Whether the input should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the input should be animated.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the checkbox slots.
